chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Hurin, p. 774—Thief-taker for the king of Shienar. He is lean and wiry, and has shoulder-length gray hair that he wears loose. His round fice is lined with age, and he has small eyes. He is also a “sniffer”—one who can “smell” evil, even where it was done in the past. He was chosen by the Borderlanders to serve as an emmissary to Rand. Rand was extremely harsh with him, and now realizes he owes him an apology. Hurin was very flattered that Rand apologized to him in person. He fought on Polov Heights with the other Borderlanders, and Rand watched him die on those same Heights.
